messages.text: Lufthansa Group Inspirational AI flight assistant. Nice to meet you!
Certainly! Share the departure airport, destination, dates, passengers, and cabin so I can check flights.

Here are the travel details in JSON format:
{
  "originLocationCode": "ZRH",
  "destinationLocationCode": "SYD",
  "departureDate": "2025-11-20",
  "returnDate": "2025-12-05",
  "adults": 1,
  "travelClass": "BUSINESS",
  "currencyCode": "CHF"
}
Please book this within the Lufthansa Group network.
